original_text: And the border went up toward Debir from the valley of Achor, and so northward, looking toward Gilgal, that is before the going up to Adummim, which is on the south side of the river: and the border passed toward the waters of Enshemesh, and the goings out thereof were at Enrogel:
korean_text: 또 아골 골짜기에서부터 드빌을 지나 북쪽으로 올라가서 그 강 남쪽에 있는 아둠밈 비탈 맞은편 길갈을 향하고 나아가 엔 세메스 물들을 지나 엔로겔에 이르며

sentences.original_text: And the border went up toward Debir
that is before the going up to Adummim
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 아둠님으로 올라가는 길 앞에 있으니

sentences.original_text: which is on the south side of the river
and the border passed toward the waters of Enshemesh
and the goings out thereof were at Enrogel
